duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide clinical expertise and counseling services to individuals, couples, and teens.
Exercise autonomy over clinical decisions and treatment approaches.
Ensure privacy, confidentiality, and secure communication with clients.
Manage professional liability and maintain a private environment for therapy sessions.
Maintain reliable Internet connection for remote therapy sessions.

education_certification.credential: Fully licensed by a State Board to provide counseling independently and without supervision (e.g., LCSW, LPC, LMFT, PsyD or similar credentials)
